enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Reserved for students who are currently enrolled in or have taken and passed STAT 320-1.
title: WCAS STAT 320-2-21 Statistical Methods

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course presents an introduction to statistical theory and methodology. Topics covered include parameter estimation, confidence intervals, and hypothesis testing.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Students will learn the theoretical basis for commonly-used statistical methods as well as some of the tools needed to develop statistical methods.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Homework, a midterm and a final exam.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Modern Statistical Methods with Applications, 2nd Ed. By J. L. Devore and K. N. Berk published by Springer. ISBN 978-1-4614-0390-6; e-ISBN 978-1-4614-0391-3. List price $119 (print), $89 (eBook).

subject: STAT
